name: ReplyBox – Better WordPress Comments
author: ReplyBox

sections.description:
Want a Disqus alternative that simplifies everything? ReplyBox is a simple, privacy-focused comment system that’s lightweight and blazingly-fast.

Private: Built For Peace of Mind

Who doesn’t love tracking, ads and affiliate links every time they log on? Turns out everyone!

We know that you and your users don’t want to have to navigate ads and worry about the way your personal data is being handled, so we built a comment system with a difference.

All we’re focused on is making sure those all-important little comments get to where they need to go, and nothing else. That means we never monetize data, take over links, or track who’s doing what.

We’re built and hosted in the UK, fully secured, and encrypted. Not only that, if you want to know how we use the tiny amount of data we do collect, all you have to do is ask.

Lightweight: Built For Speed

Fast page loading means happy visitors, and happy visitors mean more customers.

That’s why we made ReplyBox just 17 KB so that we’re super fast, lightweight and truly agile when you compare us to any other comment system. Perfect for when you want Google to notice that you’ve sped up your game and you’re worthy of jumping up their rankings.

And Disqus? It’s nearly 30 times heavier than we are.

We Always Look the Part

We made ReplyBox so that it’s modern, minimalist and mobile friendly from the moment you get started.

Features

ReplyBox is all about making life simpler, so we added everything you need and nothing more.

Goodbye Spam: We use Akismet and a few other bright ideas to keep the spammers on the sidelines where they belong.

Instant Moderation: Control all new comments with a manual approval system that’s simple and effective.

Markdown Formatting: Links, lists, quotes, code blocks and even your favorite emojis are all welcome here 💪

Natural Discussion: We’ve added nested comments so your users can reply direct to any comment they like and share their bright ideas.

Always in the Loop: Anyone can subscribe to email notifications in an instant so that a reply or comment is never missed.

Social Login: Make commenting even easier by authenticating via Google in just two clicks (Twitter and the rest coming soon).

Work Wonders With WordPress: Import existing comments and sync everything without ever having to lift a finger.

Custom CSS: Use CSS to transform ReplyBox into the on-brand addition your business has been waiting for.

Webhooks: Notify external services that new comments have been added and streamline your workflow.

Pin a Comment: Highlight a bright idea or spark of inspiration with the click of a button so you never lose it.

Emoji Reactions (coming soon): Sometimes all you need is a simple 👍 or 😍, so we’re adding it for you.

More Design Options (coming soon): Our designers are hard at work putting the finishing touches to even more ways to turn on the style.

Plugin Features

Our WordPress plugin means you get ReplyBox without having to do a thing. Once installed, ReplyBox replaces the native WordPress comment system.

Comment Import: Import existing WordPress comments to ReplyBox with the click of a button.

Comment Syncing: Any new comments posted to ReplyBox will be synced to WordPress. Meaning, if at any point you disable the ReplyBox WordPress plugin, your comments will remain in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.3.0

  • Re-order settings page for clearer setup
  • Add language support to settings
  • Add sort order support to settings

1.2.0

  • Add saved notices on admin area
  • Add notice on comment management
  • Disable comments via wp-comments-post.php

1.1.2

  • Support for WordPress Twenty Twenty Three and Block Themes

1.1.1

  • [fix] PHP error in welcome class

1.1.0

  • Add welcome page
  • [readme] Update feature list

1.0.1

  • [fix] Fix PHP 8 warning about __wakeup method.

1.0.0

  • Version bump and compatibility checks.

0.5

  • Add support for authenticating WordPress users with ReplyBox via single sign-on.

0.4.2

  • Don’t show the ReplyBox embed on post types with comments closed.

0.4.1

  • Don’t show the ReplyBox embed on WooCommerce product pages.
  • Fix “PHP Notice: register_rest_route was called incorrectly”.

0.4

  • Enable linking to individual comments.

0.3

  • Fix comment links not scrolling to the comments section.

0.2

  • Added API endpoints for updating and deleting comments.

0.1

  • Initial release.
sections.reviews:
Does what it says on the box

By verygoodplugins on April 30, 2022

We just discovered ReplyBox recently and are currently in the process of switching over several of our sites. Integration so far has been pretty easy, and it's a big step up over the native WordPress comment system. I like how they're privacy focused and conscious of bloat— we haven't noticed any change in the load speed of our posts since adding ReplyBox. Looks great, works great, would recommend 👍

A breath of fresh air

By zackkatz on April 29, 2022

It's so nice to finally have a great option that makes commenting fast, simple, and easy to use. Even better? I trust ReplyBox and the people behind it. If you're considering Disqus, dont! It's bloated, has advertising and tracking code, and is a terrible user experience. If you want comments on your site, don't think twice: ReplyBox is an easy win.

WordPress Comments Revolutionized

By Chris Badgett (chrisbadgett) on April 29, 2022

Finally! The Disqus alternative I've been searching for. Amazing product + world class support.

Seemingly perfect, but...

By emangham on April 26, 2022

The set-up was blissfully easy, and the form has a nice design. I just wish it would feature:-
  • Ability to add links to user profiles.
  • Ability for users to edit their comments.
  • Ability for users to delete their comments.

Simple, effective and extremely performant

By Iain Poulson (polevaultweb) on June 26, 2020

I’m using ReplyBox on all my sites now for comments. It has an elegant and clean look, and doesn’t slow down my page load times by loading lots of scripts.
